author: Wang Jun, Zheng Guoqiao
notes: 王均, 郑国乔 / Wang Jun, Zheng Guoqiao. 仫佬语简志 / Mulao yu jian zhi (A Sketch of Mulao [Mulam]). Beijing: 民族出版社: 新華書店发行 / Min zu chu ban she: Xin hua shu dian fa xing, 1980.The selected variant is that of Dongmen (东门镇), Luocheng County (罗城县), Guangxi, China. Dongmen Mulam tones are:1 = /42/2 = /121/3 = /53/4 = /24/5 = /44/6 = /11/7S = /55/7L = /42/8S = /12/8L = /11/
